summary: Nissan is a big Japanese car company based in Yokohama. They make cars under the Nissan, Infiniti, and formerly Datsun brands. Nissan is part of a large alliance with Renault and Mitsubishi. In 2017, it was the sixth biggest automaker globally. Nissan also leads in electric vehicle sales, selling over 320,000 all-electric cars worldwide.
title: Nissan
